content: Taking the path by the Shrine, you'll head down the slope and take a right to find the start of the river, which has a green Wisp to absorb and plants to harvest. Leave the other side of the ravine for the moment, and take the closer path on the side of a ravine nearest to where you came down.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Brook of Bliss'.
The content is as follows:
Taking the path by the Shrine, you'll head down the slope and take a right to find the start of the river, which has a green Wisp to absorb and plants to harvest. Leave the other side of the ravine for the moment, and take the closer path on the side of a ravine nearest to where you came down.
